name: suction, shavings, softwood | shavings, softwood, measured as dry mass | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/12946/documentation

This data represents the service of collecting shavings from the planing of softwood, expressed per kg dry mass and transporting it to its silo via aspiration.

The activity starts with the shavings at the planing machine.

This activity ends with the shavings collected at a silo at the sawmill site. The dataset does not include direct wood dust emissions. The infrasturcture for the pipes and pumps as well as for the silo are assumed be part of the infrastructure DS for the sawmill.
category: C:Manufacturing/16:Manufacture of wood and of products of wood and cork, except furniture; manufacture of articles of straw and plaiting materials/161:Sawmilling and planing of wood/1610:Sawmilling and planing of wood

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: The exchanges of this child dataset are identical to the GLO dataset. This dataset was created to enable linking to regional markets (e.g. for electricity). Data quality indicators were adjusted accordingly
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Extrapolated from Swiss data. The exchanges of this child dataset are identical to the GLO dataset. This dataset was created to enable linking to regional markets (e.g. for electricity). Data quality indicators were adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: complementary literature and sampling from sawmills

exchanges.description: shavings recollected from the planing process where they are generated as loose shavings.
